content: FOUR! THERE IT IS! Very full and outside off, Sharafu drives it through covers and it races to the fence. UAE WIN BY 7 WICKETS. HISTORIC DAY FOR THEM.
Bangs it short and on off, Khan slashes his blade and misses it. We will go in the last over.
SIX! History calling UAE! Very full and around off, pace on and Khan thumps it over long off for a biggie. A run away now...
Another dot! Still no pressure on UAE! Good bowling from Tanzim Hasan Sakib as he bowls back of the hand, outside off. Khan swings and misses it.
Bowls into the surface, short and outside off, close to the tramline. Khan swings and misses.
A good length ball, the off cutter, outside off. Khan steps across and lets it go.
SIX! KHAN IS IN A HURRY! Very full and right in the slot on off. Khan shows his power and hits it over long off for a biggie.
Wide! Starts with a length ball over the tramline, this is outside off. Khan leaves.
Good running! Bowls a slower yorker on middle. Sharafu digs it out to long on for a couple of runs.
A low full toss, outside off. Khan pushes it to cover for a single.
Full and wide outside off, inside the tramline. Khan lets it go. Dots are gold right now.
Short in length and on middle, Sharafu works it to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Shamim Hossain puts his body on the line. Full and outside off, Khan drives it to covers where Hossain dives and gets a big hand on it. That was racing away easily.
Wide! Full and flirts with the tramline, well outside off. Khan leaves it alone.
SIX! 20 runs needed in 17. Short in length and on off, anticipated line and length. Khan pulls it over mid-wicket for a biggie.
FOUR! Sharafu finds the fence again! On a nagging length, outside off, Sharafu smashes it through cover for a boundary. UAE racing away with runs.
Excellent slower ball again! Length ball, outside off. Sharafu looks to cut but misses.
The in-dipper, full and outside off. Khan slices his shot over backward point for a single.
The back of the hand delivery, full and on off, Sharafu drives it to long off for a single.
Length ball on top of off. Khan chops it to third man for a single.
A full toss from Islam around off, Sharafu crunches it through covers for a single.
19 runs off the over. This is full and outside off, spins away. Khan swings across the line but misses.
SIX! BACK TO BACK! Fuller delivery, outside off, Khan swings his blade and connects it over long on for a biggie. Khan targeting Bangladesh's main bowler.
SIX! That was meant to go the distance! Floats it full and on middle, in the slot and Khan clears his front leg and slams it over long on for a six.
Tad short and on middle, Sharafu pulls it to mid-wicket for a single.
Sharafu feels he has missed out there. Shorter and outside off, Sharafu looks to cut but misses.
SIX! Fifty for Sharafu! Welcome boundary! Much needed as well. Short in length and outside off. Sharafu slams it over long off, just over the fielder there. Six runs.

WELL BOWLED! Shoriful Islam bangs it short and well directed onto the batter. Khan looks to tuck it away but misses and get hit on his right bicep. Looks like he is in a lot of pain and the physio is out. Magic spray does it work again and Khan is raring to go.
A slower bumper outside off. Khan looks to cut it but misses.
Very full and outside off, Sharafu drives it to long off for a single.
Short in length and on top of middle. Khan works it through covers for a single.
Length and outside off, Sharafu cuts it to deep point for a single.
Short in length and on off. Khan knocks it to long off for a single.
Flat and on middle, Sharafu slams it down the ground. The fielder runs to his left, dives and brilliantly keeps it out for two. Excellent fielding.
The one that turns back in, outside off. Khan works it late to short third man for a single.
Floated quicker outside off, Khan looks to slog sweep but misses.
Tossed up on middle, Sharafu chops it to cover for a single.
Outside off, Sharafu cuts it late to short third man who dives to his right and gets a hand on it. The batters get two.
Rishad Hossain bowls it on a length and outside off, Sharafu goes back and cuts but to point.
Very full and on leg, Sharafu flicks it to deep mid-wicket for a single. 100 up for UAE.
Dishes out the yorker, outside off. Sharafu looks to jab it out but misses.
Touch fuller, outside off, Sharafu makes room and slaps it to deep cover for a brace. 9 runs so far.
Length ball on top of off. Sharafu tucks it through mid-wicket and comes back for the second. Excellent running.
FOUR! Good shot! Good length ball, outside off, Sharafu cuts it through point, past the fielder for a boundary.
Length ball, outside off, Khan cuts it to point for a quick single.
Too full and on middle, Sharafu drives it to cover. Hasan Mahmud mixing his length very nicely here.
Bangs it short and on the slower side on leg. Sharafu ducks under it.
Tad fuller and on middle and leg. Khan plays it to deep square leg for a single.
This is full and on middle, Sharafu nudges it to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Wide! Hasan Mahmud bowls the slower one, length and outside off. Sharafu swings and misses.
Back of a length and on middle. Khan pulls it to deep square leg for one more.
Short in length and on middle, Khan hops and blocks it out.
SIX! HELPED AWAY! Drops it short and outside off, Sharafu takes his chance and ramps it over third man for a biggie.
A length ball, outside off, Khan dabs it to third man for a single.

OUT! TAKEN! Excellent bowling! Tanzim Hasan Sakib comes up with the back of the hand delivery, length and on middle, Chopra goes for the pull but is late to the shot. It lobs to deep mid-wicket where Shamim Hossain slides in and takes a well judged catch. Bangladesh on top now.
Rahul Chopra (wk) c S Hossain b TH Sakib 13 (13b 0x4 1x6)
Bangs it short and bowls it outside off. Chopra leaves it alone to the keeper.
Very full and outside off, Alishan Sharafu guides it to third man for a single.
On a nagging length and outside off, Alishan Sharafu slaps it to cover for a couple.
A dot to end the over. Tidy from Hossain! Full and on middle, Chopra sweeps it to square leg.
Flatter and outside off, Chopra punches it to cover.
Tossed up on off, Alishan Sharafu lofts it to long off and rotates the strike.
Fuller ball, outside off. Chopra drives it past cover for a single.
Too full and on middle, Alishan Sharafu turns it to square leg for a single.
Very full and on middle, Chopra eases it to long on for a single.
Too full and on middle, Chopra bunts it to mid-wicket for a single. 11 runs of the over.
SIX! Picks the bones out of it! Flighted full and on off, Chopra gets on his knee and slogs it over mid-wicket for a biggie. Welcome boundary after the wicket.
Tossed up on middle, Alishan Sharafu skips down and drills it to long on for a single.
Full and on middle, Chopra drills it to long on for a single.
Quicker and in the blockhole on middle, Alishan Sharafu makes room and carves it to point for a single.
Floated full and on middle, Chopra flicks it to square leg for a single.
Outside off, Chopra guides it through point for a single to end the over.
Flat and outside off, Alishan Sharafu plays it through covers for a single.
TAP AND RUN! Fuller delivery on off, Chopra taps it in front of point for a quick single. A dive by Alishan Sharafu helps to get his end.
Bowls it full and outside off, spins away. Chopra leans to defend but misses.

OUT! BOWLED! Through the gate! Floats it full and on middle, it lands and spins back in. Zohaib leaves a gap open as he tries to defend. It goes through and crashes the stumps. So, both the dangerous openers gone back to the hut.
Muhammad Zohaib b R Hossain 29 (23b 3x4 2x6)
Rishad Hossain starts with a fuller ball on leg. Zohaib keeps it out on the leg side.
On the pads, Zohaib flicks it to deep square leg for a single.
Leg bye! Angles in a full ball on the pads. Alishan Sharafu misses his clip and it rolls to square leg for a leg bye.
Tanzim Hasan Sakib dishes out the slower one, outside off. Alishan Sharafu looks to cut but misses.
Hard length delivery on leg, Alishan Sharafu nudges it to mid-wicket.
SIX! ALL THE WAY! Pitches it short and on middle, Alishan Sharafu pulls it well over fine leg and it goes all the way. Good partnership building up.
Lovely start by Sakib! Short of a length and around off, Alishan Sharafu looks to defend it across but misses.
Too full and on leg, Alishan Sharafu drills it to long on for a single.
Flatter and around leg, Alishan Sharafu makes room and slaps it to mid off.
FOUR! MORE! Alishan Sharafu hits one now! Fractionally short and on middle, Alishan Sharafu makes room and pulls it througuh mid-wicket for a boundary.
Tossed up on middle, Zohaib turns it to mid-wicket for a single.
What happened there? Quicker, short and on middle, skids on. Zohaib looks to go big but misses and the keeper gets hit near the chest but he quickly gets on his feet.
FOUR! Easy shot to pick up! Slightly short and slower around off. Zohaib rocks back to pull it over mid-wicket for a boundary.
Tad short and on middle. Alishan Sharafu softly plays it to mid-wicket.
Well deceived! Short in length and on off, nips in. Alishan Sharafu looks to guide it but it gets too close to his body, it rolls to the keeper.
Length ball, outside off, Zohaib knocks it to cover and rotates the strike.
SIX! Runs kicking in! Short of a length and outside off. Zohaib flashes his blade and hits it over extra cover for a six.
SIX! HAMMERED! Picks the length quickly. On the shorter side on middle, Zohaib pulls it over cow corner for a biggie.
Hasan Mahmud generates some extra bounce up front, this is on a length and outside off. Zohaib looks to push but misses.
Angles across a full ball, well outside off. Alishan Sharafu throws his bat at it but seems to miss. Bangladesh appeal for caught behind but turned down quickly.
FOUR! Crunched away! On a nagging length and a lot of width outside off. Alishan Sharafu plays it delightfully through point for a boundary.
Length ball on middle, Zohaib nudges it to square leg for a single.
A peach of a delivery from Islam! Swings in a full ball on middle and it shapes in late. Zohaib fails to flick and gets hit on the pads. Going down.
On a good length and on middle and leg, Zohaib gets behind the line and blocks back to Islam who has a shy but instead hits Zohaib's boots. Apologises quickly.
Shoriful Islam dishes out a full ball on middle, Zohaib pushes it to mid off.
The arm ball, this is bowled on the pads. Zohaib tucks it to square leg for a single.
Bowls it full and outside off, Zohaib plays it to cover.
Hasan slows it up and bowls close to the off pole. Zohaib looks to push it across but misses.
FOUR! IN THE GAP! Quality shot! Floated full and outside off, Zohaib goes back and punches it through covers for a boundary.
Tossed up on off, Zohaib punches with soft hands to cover.
Shorter and on leg, Alishan Sharafu nudges it to deep mid-wicket for a single.
BEATEN! Lovely! Shoriful Islam just pushes it in the channel of uncertainty, outside off and Zohaib has a poke at it but misses.
Very full and on leg, Alishan Sharafu tucks it to deep square leg for a single. He is off the mark.
On a good length and on leg, shaping in. Alishan Sharafu looks to flick but misses and gets hit on the pads.
Wide! Full and going down the leg side, Alishan Sharafu looks to flick but misses.

OUT! EDGED AND GONE! It's the skipper! It's the main man! Bangladesh get Waseem cheaply! Shoriful Islam angles away a length ball, outside off, width on offer and Waseem goes foe the drive but edges it to first slip where Tanzid Hasan holds onto it.
Muhammad Waseem (c) c T Hasan b S Islam 9 (6b 2x4 0x6)
BEATEN! Short in length and on middle, skids a bit. Waseem stands tall to pull but misses it.
FOUR! Over the fielder! Serves it full and on leg, shaping in. Waseem whips it over short fine leg for a boundary.
Wide! Starts with a length ball down leg, Waseem misses his flick.
FOUR! Zohaib is underway in style. Shorter and on middle, Zohaib goes back and slams it down the ground for a boundary.
An arm ball, flat and on off, Zohaib punches it straight to cover.
Tossed up on off, Zohaib pushes it to point.
Mahedi Hasan bowls short again, quicker and on off, Waseem works it to deep mid-wicket for one.
FOUR! The skipper gets his team underway! Slightly short and on middle, Waseem pulls it over square leg for a boundary. Just wide of the fielder.
Flat and angling on leg, Waseem nudges it to short fine leg.

A triple to end the innings! Slower ball on the full, at the sticks. Shoriful Islam swings hard and gets it off the inner half toward the deep square leg region. Two is the call initially, and an overthrow from the fielder allows them to complete the third run. Bangladesh finish on 162/9.

NO BALL! High full toss, on the middle and leg. Hasan Mahmud hacks it toward the deep mid-wicket region and takes a couple. No ball signaled for the height, and Muhammad Waseem cannot bowl now since he already delivered two beamers in the over. Alishan Sharafu will finish the over.
Yorker on off. Drilled back to the bowler, who deflects it off the leg toward extra cover for a single.

FOUR! NO NEED TO RUN FOR IT! Pitched full, around off. Shoriful Islam clears the front leg and drills it toward the deep extra cover region for a thumping boundary. They are valuable runs for Bangladesh.
Full, in the slot. Hasan Mahmud heaves it along the ground to long-on for one.
SIX! HIGH AND HANDSOME! 150 up for Bangladesh. Short of a good length, on off. Hasan Mahmud makes room and slams it over the bowler, down the ground for a mighty hit.
Back of a length delivery on off. Hasan Mahmud forces the cut through extra cover for a brace.

NO BALL AND SIX! A high full toss, on the leg stump line. Hasan Mahmud charges down the pitch, swings hard, and gets the top edge that flies over the fine leg boundary for a maximum. No ball given for the height and a free hit is coming up.
Slower ball on a length, around off. Shoriful Islam eases it toward the deep cover region for a couple.
SIX! POOR BALL AND PUNISHED! Slower bumper, on the middle stump line. Shoriful Islam goes for it and tonks it over deep mid-wicket fence for half a dozen.
Length ball outside off. Shoriful Islam cuts it to backward point.
Back of a length delivery on off. Shoriful Islam defends into the off-side.

SIX AND OUT! Saghir Khan has the last laugh. Pitched full, outside off. Jaker Ali looks to clear the ropes again, but he slices it off the outer half toward the deep point region, where the substitute Muhammad Zuhaib takes a simple catch. End of a fighting knock from Jaker Ali. Bangladesh are nine down.
Jaker Ali (wk) c sub Muhammad Zuhaib b Saghir Khan 41 (34b 1x4 3x6)
SIX! ALL THE WAY! Full-length delivery in the slot, around off. Jaker Ali shuffles and slams it hard over the long-off fence for a biggie.
Low full toss on off. Eased down to long-on for a single by Jaker Ali.
Full-length delivery on off. Driven past the bowler toward long-off for one.
SIX! Vital runs for Bangladesh. Matiullah Khan goes short, angled into the batter. Hasan Mahmud takes it on and hooks it over the man at long-leg for a maximum.
Back of a length delivery, outside off. Hasan Mahmud swings and misses.
Good length delivery on off. Jaker Ali hits it to long-on for a single.
FOUR! FINDS THE GAP! Full-length delivery outside off. Jaker Ali shuffles and drags the swipe toward the cow corner region for four runs.
Low full toss, around off. Eased the drive toward long-off and keeps the strike.
WIDE! On a length, well outside the tramline. Jaker Ali lets it go. Another wide in the over.
Pitched full, on off. Hasan Mahmud bunts it to mid-off for a single.
Full-length delivery outside off. Hasan Mahmud plays and misses.
Back of a length delivery on off. Pulled to deep backward square leg for one.
SIX! MUSCLED! 100 comes up for Bangladesh. Slower ball on the full, outside off. Jaker Ali stays deep inside the crease and pumps it over wide long-on for half a dozen.
Slower ball yorker, around off. Jaker Ali jams it to short third.
WIDE! Full-length delivery, well outside the tramline. Jaker Ali swings and misses. Wide to start the over.
Short of a good length, outside off. Jaker Ali dabs it toward backward point and takes a quick run.
Back of a length delivery outside off. Hasan Mahmud gets the outside edge to deep third for one.
Good length delivery, just outside off. Jaker Ali cuts it toward extra cover and calls for a quick single. Hasan Mahmud responds and gets home in time.
Full-length delivery on off. Hasan Mahmud bunts it to mid-off for a quick single.
Short of a good length, around off. Hasan Mahmud dabs it toward backward point.
Good length delivery outside off. Jaker Ali cuts it to deep backward point for a single.
Back of a length delivery on the middle. Hasan Mahmud defends from the crease and drops it onto the pitch.
On a length, just outside off. Hasan Mahmud dabs it to backward point.
Full-length delivery outside off. Jaker Ali drives it toward wide of long-off for a single.
Pace-off delivery on a length, outside off. Jaker Ali cuts it on the bounce off the outer edge, toward the short third fielder.
Slower ball on a length, outside off. Pulled toward deep backward square leg for a couple.
SIX! BOOM! Back of a length delivery outside off. Jaker Ali picks it early and smacks it cleanly over the deep mid-wicket fence for half a dozen.

OUT! CAUGHT! Saghir Khan gets among the wickets! Back of a length delivery, around off. Tanzim Hasan Sakib looks to pull it out of the park, but it hits the bat on the higher part and goes toward the long-on region, where Muhammad Waseem makes no mistake. Bangladesh are in danger of not batting out their overs here. Eighth one down for the visiting side.
Tanzim Hasan Sakib c M Waseem b S Khan 6 (12b 0x4 0x6)
Slower ball on the full, on the leg. Tanzim Hasan Sakib flicks it toward the long-leg regin for a couple.
Back of a length on the middle and leg. Tanzim Hasan Sakib tucks it to mid-wicket.
WIDE! Banged in short, over the batter. Tanzim Hasan Sakib gets under and lets it go. Wide signaled.
Back of a length delivery, around off. Jaker Ali pulls it on the bounce to wide of long-on for a single.
WIDE! On a length, angled down the leg. Jaker Ali plays and misses. Wide signaled.
Full-length delivery around off. Jaker Ali bunts it back to the bowler.

On a hard length, on off. Tanzim Hasan Sakib hits it on the up toward cover and calls for a quick single. Jaker Ali responds but puts the dive as the throw comes in and gets his head hard onto the pitch. The helmet also comes out and the physio comes out for a concussion check.
Hard length delivery on the middle. Tucked toward deep mid-on for a run.
Pitched full, just outside off. Tanzim Hasan Sakib pushes it to short extra cover.
Back of a length delivery on off. Jaker Ali knocks it past the bowler, toward mid-on for one.
Back of a length delivery just outside off. Jaker Ali rides the bounce and stabs it into the off-side.
On a length, outside off. Tanzim Hasan Sakib steers it toward backward point and a fumble in the field allows the single.
Skiddy length ball, outside off. Jaker Ali knocks it through covers for a single.
Flatter length ball, around off. Tanzim Hasan Sakib pats it toward point. End of a terrific spell from Haider Ali.

Tosses it on a length, on the middle and leg. Tanzim Hasan Sakib stays back and looks to work it across the line. He misses and gets stuck in front. Appeal, but the umpire shakes his head. Probably going over the stumps.
Arm ball, on the middle and leg. Nudged past mid-wicket for a single.
Full, on the middle and leg. Pushed past the short mid-wicket fielder for one.
Tossed up on the middle. Jaker Ali dabs it toward the point and takes a quick run.
Too full, on the leg. Jaker Ali looks to sweep but misses onto the pad. Appeal but this was going down the leg.
Length ball, at the sticks. Tanzim Hasan Sakib blocks it to short mid-wicket. End of a successful over from Matiullah Khan.
Good length delivery just outside off and beats the defence of Tanzim Hasan Sakib.

OUT! LBW! A second wicket in the over for Matiullah Khan. Bowls it on a good length, on the middle and leg stump line. Rishad Hossain looks to play across the line but misses and is pinned in front. Appeal from the bowler and up goes the finger. Rishad Hossain departs for a duck. Bangladesh lose their seventh.
Rishad Hossain lbw M Khan 0 (2b 0x4 0x6)
Slower ball on a length, outside off. Jaker Ali punches it to deep point for a single.
LEG BYE! On a length, angled down the leg. Rishad Hossain turns it to short fine leg off his pad for a leg bye.

OUT! CAUGHT BEHIND! Matiullah Khan gets among the wickets after the break. Bowls it on a length, well outside off. Shamim Hossain looks to cut through point but gets the under-edge that is taken nicely by Rahul Chopra behind the sticks. Bangladesh are six down in the series decider.
Shamim Hossain c R Chopra b M Khan 9 (12b 1x4 0x6)
Back of a length delivery on the middle and leg. Shamim Hossain tucks it to mid-wicket for a single.
On a length, close to the off-stump. Shamim Hossain chops it toward backward point.
Back of a length delivery around off. Jaker Ali pulls it toward long-on for one.
Back of a length on the hip. Shamim Hossain glances it to fine leg for a single.
Length ball, well outside off. Jaker Ali steers it to deep backward point for a single.
Back of a length delivery outside off. Shamim Hossain cuts it to deep point for a single.
Tossed up full, on off. Jaker Ali comes forward and blocks it.

Big appeal, but the umpire is unmoved! Tosses it on the middle and leg stump line. Jaker Ali prods and looks to work it across the line. He misses and gets pinned in front. The umpire shakes his head as it might have been going down the leg.
Floated full, on off. Shamim Hossain eases it to long-off for one.
Full, on off. Pushed to short cover by Shamim Hossain.
Tossed up full, at the stumps. Shamim Hossain covers the line and defends it to mid-wicket.
FOUR! PUNISHED! Short and wide outside off. Shamim Hossain cuts it through the backward point region and finds the ropes in a flash.
Pushed through fuller, and quicker, at the sticks. Jaker Ali turns it to short mid-wicket.
Arm ball, on the middle and leg. Shamim Hossain nudges it to deep backward square leg for one.
Tad short, outside off. Jaker Ali steers it to deep point for a single.
Quicker length ball, comes on with the arm, just outside off. Jaker Ali dabs it to point.
Flatter on off. Jaker Ali punches it to short cover.
Tossed up on off. Jaker Ali prods and blocks.
Back of a length delivery on off. Shamim Hossain gets on top of the bounce and stabs it to point. End of a successful over from Akif Raja.
On a length, on the middle. Shamim Hossain tucks it to mid-wicket.

OUT! CLEANED HIM UP! Akif Raja comes around the wicket and bowls it on a length, angled into the middle stump line. Tanzid Hasan looks to defend on the front foot, but the ball goes through the gate and crashes into the stumps. Bangladesh have lost half of their side now. The United Arab Emirates are on top of their game.
Tanzid Hasan b A Raja 40 (18b 4x4 4x6)
FOUR! TOO EASY! The length ball strays down the leg. Tanzid Hasan helps it to fine leg for another boundary.
On a length, around off. Dabbed to point.
FOUR! PUT AWAY! Back of a length delivery on off. Tanzid Hasan picks it early and pulls it powerfully to deep mid-wicket region for a cracking boundary.

OUT! BOWLED'EM! Haider Ali gets his third, and the United Arab Emirates are on top. Flatter arm ball, on the middle stump line. Mahedi Hasan makes room for the cut, but he misses, and the ball hits the timber. Bangladesh slides into further trouble as they lose their fourth wicket inside the powerplay.
Mahedi Hasan b H Ali 2 (9b 0x4 0x6)
Mahedi Hasan finally brings out the release shot. This was tossed up on the middle. Mahedi Hasan slogs it toward deep mid-wicket for a double.
On a length, just outside off. Dabbed to backward point by Mahedi Hasan.
Pitched full, at the sticks. Mahedi Hasan gets forward and blocks it out.
Tosses it on the middle. Mahedi Hasan prods and gets the inside edge onto the pad.
Flatter, a hint of turn, around off. Punched to short cover.
SIX MORE! STRAIGHT AS AN ARROW! Tossed up full, around off. Tanzid Hasan thumps it back over the bowler and toward the sight screen for back-to-back sixes.
SIX! BOOM! Dropped short, on off. Sits up nicely for Tanzid Hasan who goes back and pumps it over the cow corner boundary for a colossal hit.
Tossed up full, on off. Tanzid Hasan drives it to the cover fielder.
Flatter arm ball, on off. Tanzid Hasan knocks it into covers.
FOUR! PUNISHED! Tad short, on the middle and leg. Tanzid Hasan pulls it past the man at short fine leg for an easy boundary.
Flatter on off. Tanzid Hasan defends from the crease.
Quicker arm ball, on the leg pole. Mahedi Hasan looks to tuck but misses and wears on the thigh pad. A double wicket maiden from Haider Ali.
Flatter and turns away, around off. Dabbed to short third.
Tosses it on a length, on the middle. Mahedi Hasan blocks it forward.

OUT! LBW! Second wicket in the over for Haider Ali. He is off the blocks and is overjoyed with two wickets in three balls. Full delivery on the middle and leg stump line. Tawhid Hridoy advances and looks to whip it across the line, but misses and gets stuck in front. Appeal from the bowler as the umpire takes his time but raises the finger. Bangladesh are three down and in some trouble now.
Tawhid Hridoy lbw H Ali 0 (2b 0x4 0x6)
Pitched full, on off. Tawhid Hridoy prods and defends.

OUT! LBW! Maiden T20I wicket for Haider Ali. Bowls it slower through the air, on the full, on the middle stump line. Litton Das gets across and looks to paddle it away, but misses and gets pinned in front. An appeal from the bowler and up goes the finger. Haider Ali is pumped, and the Bangladesh skipper departs cheaply.
Litton Das (c) lbw H Ali 14 (10b 1x4 1x6)
Full and wide outside off. Tanzid Hasan charges down and bunts it off the cue end toward the cover-point fielder. 18 runs coming off the over.
SIX! UP AND AWAY! On a length, on the middle. Tanzid Hasan picks the bones out of it and dispatches it over the deep square leg fence for a biggie.
WIDE! Slower ball on a length, but down the leg. Tanzid Hasan plays and misses. Wide signaled by the umpire.
Fuller than a length, on the middle and leg. Litton Das works it toward the wide of mid-on for a single.
SIX! BANG! Short of a good length, on off. Litton Das gets across, picks it early, and smokes it over the deep mid-wicket fence for half a dozen.
FOUR! NICELY DONE! Good length delivery on off. Litton Das makes room and times it past the man at cover-point. Races off the turf for a lovely boundary.
Fuller than a length, angled into the middle and leg stump line. Litton Das charges down for the heave across the line but gets the inside edge onto the pitch.
Flat and angled into the middle. Litton Das knocks it to long-on for a single.
Touch short, around off. Litton Das steers it to backward point.
Flatter on the leg. Litton Das glances it to short fine leg.
Drifted down the leg. Nudged through backward square leg for a couple.
Flighted full, on off. Litton Das comes forward and defends into covers.

OUT! TAKEN! Dhruv Parashar strikes the first ball. Tosses it on the full, on off. Parvez Hossain Emon decides to go downtown and clear the ropes. He fails to get the desired connection and is caught near the long-off boundary by Alishan Sharafu. The centurion from the first game departs for a golden duck today. Bangladesh are rocked early.
Parvez Hossain Emon c A Sharafu b D Parashar 0 (1b 0x4 0x6)
SIX! DEPOSITED OUT OF THE PARK! Back of a length delivery again, on the middle and leg stump line. Tanzid Hasan picks it early and dispatches it over deep backward square leg fence for half a dozen.
In the air but lands safely! Back of a length delivery on the middle. Tanzid Hasan shimmies down and pulls it on the bounce to mid-wicket.
On a length, on off. Tanzid Hasan mistimes the pull to mid-on.
Good comeback. Pitched full, on off. Tanzid Hasan advances and looks to drive through the covers but gets the inside edge onto the pad.
FOUR! THRASHED! Fuller than a length, outside off. Tanzid Hasan shimmies down and hammers it through the cover-point region for a cracking boundary.
Akif Raja comes round the wicket and bowls it on a full-length, on off. Tanzid Hasan pushes it to mid-off.
